abstract: Inside Wealth column observes that growing number of wealthy wine collectors are using their expensive vintages to get loans to invest in more wine; some wine lenders are offering collectors cash for up to 60 percent of value of their collections, with low interest rates, and have issued tens of millions of dollars in loans over last several years with only wine as collateral.
lead_paragraph: Loans guaranteed by stashes of fine wines are allowing oenophiles to meet their short-term financial needs while their collections age to perfection.

headline.main: A Cellar Full of Collateral, by the Bottle or the Case
headline.print_headline: A Cellar Full of Collateral, by the Bottle or the Case

snippet: Loans guaranteed by stashes of fine wines are allowing oenophiles to meet their short-term financial needs while their collections age to perfection.
